extensionAttribute.description: This attribute verifies that time server that is set in the OS. The value to be verified will need to be specified when creating this extension attribute. Example: "time.apple.com" verifies that the time server is set to "time.apple.com".
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh desiredValue="EditFromTemplate_Desired_Value_-_Example:_time.apple.com" result="" tmpResult="`systemsetup -getnetworktimeserver | awk '{print $4}'`" if [ "$tmpResult" == "$desiredValue" ]; then result="true" else result="false" fi if [ "$result" == "true" ]; then echo "<result>Pass ($tmpResult) </result>" else echo "<result>Fail ($tmpResult) </result>" fi
